posts.text: i miss you but you seem fine without me
when i ask "you promise" it's not because i don't trust you. it's because i've been hurt in the past.
in the end, promises are just words
i'd rather be told the truth than be lied to.  it hurts so much worse when i find out you were lying
"goodnight" is so much better than "gn"
i say sorry a lot. mostly because i feel like everything is my fault
i say i'm okay but i guess i'm a liar
i just want to be important to someone
someday someone is going to stare at you the way you stare at the moon
i hate seeing you with other people
sometimes the worst place is in your own head
nothing hurts worse than late night tears.
they say that time heals but it still hasn't gotten better
i'll never forget you. but you've already forgotten me
if you really loved me, you wouldn't have gotten over me so fast.
i just want to forget. about the pain about people who don't love me about my life.
it hurts seeing you get over me so fast.
Today my mom told me “if your absence doesn’t bother them, then your presence never mattered to them in the first place“ and i felt that.
You ever put someone first and  then they put you last.
it hurts when you go through something that kills you inside but you have to act like it doesn‘t affect you at all.
Never ignore a person who loves and cares for you, because one day you may realize that you‘ve lost the moon while counting the stars.
my worst quality? someone can hurt me over and over yet in the end i‘d still be there for them if they ever needed me.
i wanna build a relationship with someone who cares about “why” i’ve been quiet all day. not someone who gets mad cause i’m “acting different”
The worst feeling is not getting a reply back from someone you really want to talk to.
they hurt you and then they act like you hurt them.
when Ali Gatie said:  “So, please don’t break my heart don’t tear me apart, i know how it starts, trust me i’ve been broken before”  i felt that
It sucks because, for a minute I was happy, for a minute I was getting better, for a minute I had hope. but in a minute I lost it all again.
one of the hardest decisions you’ll  ever face in life is choosing whether  to walk away or try even harder.
I hate that feeling when you really  don‘t have any emotion. You feel so empty. You‘re not happy, you‘re not sad. You‘re just nothing.
do you ever feel the need to ask someone if they actually want you in their life because it feels like they don‘t really care...
if someone genuinely wants to do something to help you, you won’t have to keep reminding them.
the biggest mistake I have made in my life is letting people stay in my life far longer than they deserved to.
Do you ever say bye to someone and in the back of your mind you‘re hoping they‘ll fight for the conversation not to end...
i thought we were in love but you were just using me to recover from your broken heart
have you ever wanted to cry but no tears come out? so you just look around while feeling your heart break into a million pieces
i’m currently fighting battles that i can’t even speak to anyone about. but imma get through it
i be the first one to check up on someone, and the last to be checked on
sometimes...it’s easier to tell a stranger something very personal. it’s like there’s less risk, opening up to someone that knows nothing about you and won’t judge you.
when you burst out crying alone and realize that no one truly knows how unhappy you are because you don’t want anyone to know...
do you ever miss someone and want to tell them but you don’t because you have a gut feeling that they don’t miss you back?
when my feelings are hurt i shit down and stay quiet because i know if i say something i’m gonna fuck someone up 💔😫
it hurts the most when the person that made you feel so happy yesterday makes you feel so unhappy today
i get jealous because i’m afraid you’re gonna love someone else more than me💔
getting sad again for no reason after being happy for a long time is literally one of the worst feelings ever
those teenagers who sit in their rooms and cry themselves to sleep at night were once kids with light in their eyes and hope in their heart.
i don’t wanna look dumb again, look stupid again, cry again, all for loving someone that doesn’t love me back💔
Today i read something that said "Someone who overthinks is also someone who overloves" and i felt that.
Isn't it weird how you can totally feel the pain in your chest and stomach when something really hurts your feelings.
Sometimes your heart needs more time to accept what your mind already knows.
Do you ever get in an "i don't know" Phase in your life. Where you literally don't have a solid answer to anything. You. Just. Don't. Know.
Not everybody you want deserves you. Read it again.
Music is the only Medicine when there is no cure for the noise my mind drowns in..
Maybe if i fall in love with my depression, it will leave me too..
I hate hearing something that absolutely kill me inside and having to act like i dont care....
I didn't know how broken i was Until everytime i laughed I just wanted to cry.
Hurting someone with a truth is better than making them happy with a lie.
"why are you sad?" "i don't know" "no reason?" "oh no there are plenty of reasons, I'm just not really sure which one it is this time"
